channel.title: A count down
channel.description: Hi, if someone could post a 30 minute countdown, i wanted it in the same place runescape has there "system update in .." or w.e, but yea if anyone could help please do, and if you don't have one please don't post because i don't want this to turn into a spam topic, Thanks!

item.title: A count down
item.dc:creator: @Harleyscape_owner Harleyscape owner
item.description:
@Harleyscape_owner wrote:

actual no there isn’t a command like that because i do not use those those dumb bases, like pimpscape and cheesescape, but i don’t want a command i just want a countdown on the top of the screen or where runescape has theres. Such as a sendquest, or sendframe not a commad. Because i already have a system restart every 30 minutes but i have no way to have a countdown for it.

Read full topic

item.title: A count down
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

LittleMaffia:

log on your server do ::update 100

Yes. There should already be an ::update command on your server.

Now logon, and do ::update 1800 if you want a 30 minute count down. What LittleMaffia said was a 1 minute and 40 seconds count down.

Read full topic

item.title: A count down
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

public void frame114(int i1)
{
outStream.createFrame(114);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i1);
sendMessage("Frame 114 tested");
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

From CheezScape.
